channel.title: travel on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in travel on Barefoot Rob

item.title: hurtin
item.description: 21:19 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST On flight CX171 to Perth. 7 hour flight. Air is dry; toe skin is cracked and painful. Sinuses clogged; head hurts; keep getting woken up by two women speaking loudly in a language I don’t understand.

item.title: waitin
item.description: 14:48 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST Safely in Honkers, and just waiting for my flight, scheduled to leave in 70 minutes. Is it normal to not have a gate listed yet? Hmmm. 14:53 I just overheard the answer from an airport employee: “Oh! Too early. Long time. Because long time no boarding gate.” 15:14 At 3pm (2pm local time) the gate was listed: 71. Walking past all the shops and stuff from gate 44 area to gate 71, I realized I feel hungry.

item.title: flyin
item.description: 10:19 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST We took off ten minutes early, and I’ve just had a nice nap. Got several neat pictures on the way up, but I wonder if I’ll ever post them. Gonna work on date difference calculator. 10:53 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST in-flight breakfast! ps: I’m nearly done with proof of concept of my days old counter, but I have just discovered the dateDiff library I snagged doesn’t allow dates from the 1800s.

item.title: mornin
item.description: 05:56 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST Awake now; headed down to breaky. 06:44 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST Breakfast was lots of veggies for me and a larger variety for Lin. The restaurant had a Pepper robot in front, but it wouldn’t follow me when I beckoned it. It faced me, but didn’t come with me. Gotta pack and bounce outta here. 07:53 Wednesday 12 October 2016 JST I’m the first person in the departure lounge!

item.title: headed to airport
item.description: 23:37 Tuesday 11 October 2016 JST Lin is driving me to Narita airport because my check-in time is 7:25 tomorrow, and there are no trains that leave early enough to make it on time (if I leave from our house tomorrow). We’re going to stay in a hotel (rar) and after she drops me off at the airport tomorrow, she plans to go back to the hotel to enjoy their onsen, buffet breakfast, etc, before checking out.

item.title: panic pack
item.description: 17:51 Monday 10 October 2016 JST Oh man I’m leaving tomorrow! Today is a holiday so I thought it was Sunday and I’d be leaving in 2 days, but I’m leaving in about 24 hours, after a day of work, during which I’m supposed to buy some stuff for the trip. D’oh!
